import { useState } from "react" function Register ( {onSubmit} ) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState() const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }) } const handleSubmit = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault() onSubmit(formData) } return (

) } export default Register
